choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this email finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company]. After much thought and consideration, I have decided that it is time for me to move on to new opportunities.
My time here has been incredibly rewarding, both professionally and personally, and I am grateful for the experiences and growth I have gained during my tenure with the company. It has truly been a pleasure working alongside such talented individuals, and I will always cherish the memories made while on this journey.
I understand that my resignation may cause some inconvenience to you and the team, but please know that I am leaving in good standing and have ensured all necessary handover procedures are taken care of. If there is anything else required from me during this transition period, please do not hesitate to let me know.
I wish [Company] continued success in future endeavours, and hope the best for everyone involved. Thank you once again for everything, it has truly been a pleasure working with all of you.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
